channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action
item.description: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action by Development Centre, Public Affairs and Communications Directorate has an embargo on Monday, 5 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Development Centre, Public Affairs and Communications Directorate

item.title: The role of education in promoting positive attitudes towards migration at times of stress
item.description: The role of education in promoting positive attitudes towards migration at times of stress by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday, 5 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: The Power and Promise of Early Learning
item.description: The Power and Promise of Early Learning by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 6 November 2018, 13:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Stemming the Superbug Tide - Just A Few Dollars More
item.description: Stemming the Superbug Tide - Just A Few Dollars More by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday, 7 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2019 - Time to Face the Challenge
item.description: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2019 - Time to Face the Challenge by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Monday, 12 November 2018, 15:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: World Energy Outlook 2018
item.description: World Energy Outlook 2018 by International Energy Agency has an embargo on Tuesday, 13 November 2018, 13:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies
item.description: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration, Development Centre has an embargo on Thursday, 29 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration, Development Centre

item.title: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018
item.description: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018 by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development has an embargo on Wednesday, 5 December 2018, 0:01 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development
